text: Flash Gordon's Trip to Mars is a 1938 15-chapter science fiction Flash Gordon movie serial. It is based on a comic strip by Alex Raymond. It is the second of the three Flash Gordon movie serials made between 1936 and 1940. It is the second of the three Flash Gordon serials from Universal Pictures. Buster Crabbe stars as Flash Gordon with Jean Rogers as Dale Arden, Frank Shannon as Dr. Zarkov, Charles B. Middleton as Ming the Merciless, and Beatrice Roberts as Queen Azura. ==Story== Flash, Dale, and Zarkov discover that Ming the Merciless and Azura, Queen of Mars, have joined forces to conquer Earth with a dangerous raybeam. Martians that oppose the two evil ones are turned into clay humanoids. The heroes join the humanoids to defeat the evil Ming and Azura. == Related pages == *Flash Gordon (movie serial) *Flash Gordon Conquers the Universe Category:English-language movies Category:Flash Gordon movies Category:Movie serials Category:1938 movies Category:Movies directed by Ford Beebe Category:1930s science fiction movies Category:Movies set on Mars Category:Movies about extraterrestrial life
title: Flash Gordon's Trip to Mars
